title: Initial Virginia Tech Football ticket offerings on sale for 2022 season - VT hokiesports.com
content: Initial Virginia Tech Football ticket offerings on sale for 2022 season  VT hokiesports.com
description: Can't wait to start jumping in Lane Stadium this fall with the rest of Hokie Nation? Lock in your tickets for new head coach Brent Pry's first season at the helm and be there for another exciting season of Virginia Tech Football.
